p: The renal tissue of rats showed significantly increased lipid peroxidation levels in terms of MDA and reduction of GSH content after Cd administration. In addition, TSA oil treatment at doses of 100 and 200 mg/kg decreases the MDA levels dose-dependently in Cd-intoxicated rats. Further, GSH levels were significantly elevated in the TSA-oil- and silymarin-treated groups compared with the Cd group ( Figure 2A,B).
